description: An overview dashboard for WeatherFlow's TEMPEST Weather System using collected raw JSON logs stored in Grafana Loki.

targets.query: SELECT max("delta_t") + max("wet_bulb_temperature") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "serial_number" =~ /^$serial_number$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('$tz')

SELECT min("delta_t") + min("wet_bulb_temperature") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "serial_number" =~ /^$serial_number$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('$tz')

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hub_sn"  WHERE "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/
list.label: Hub ID
list.name: hub_sn_lookup
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hub_sn"  WHERE "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "serial_number"  where "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/
list.name: serial_number
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "serial_number"  where "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/

title: WeatherFlow - Overview (remote-socket)
